original_text:
Fruits and Jokers: 100 lines
Proprio come il suo predecessore, Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines ha un set di bobine 5 x 4 e una grafica che ricorda le macchine da frutta vintage. Questa slot online gratis a 5 rulli e 20 linee di vincita fa parte della collezione “Timeless Fruit Slots” di Playson. E come indica il nome, ci sono molti frutti e jolly da scoprire mentre giri le ruote su uno sfondo rosso scarlatto e senza colonna sonora. Il gioco di slot Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines vale un tuffo nel passato? Vediamo cosa ne pensano i nostri recensori.
Come si gioca? Caratteristiche principali
Puoi iniziare a giocare allo slot Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines online con una scommessa minima di 0,20€  fino a una scommessa massima di 100€, un’opzione perfetta per i giocatori con un budget basso o alle prime armi. La slot dispone di 20 linee di pagamento fisse, che vengono pagate solo in successione da sinistra a destra. Questo è un bel upgrade da una tradizionale slot di frutta, dove siamo abituati a vedere molte meno linee di pagamento, a volte anche meno di cinque. Nella parte inferiore del riquadro di gioco, troverai un pulsante di riproduzione automatica che puoi regolare fino a 999 giri, aumentando la velocità grazie alla modalità di rotazione rapida, che velocizza il ritmo delle ruote.
Attenzione ai simboli tutti frutti e al Wild
I simboli disponibili sono abbastanza semplici:

Ciliegie, Limoni e Arance pagano il minimo,
Uva, Angurie e Lucky 7, sono i simboli più pagati.
Il simbolo Wild è rappresentato da Joker, il personaggio chiave del gioco, che può sostituire qualsiasi altro simbolo tranne lo Scatter. Si tratta di un simbolo generoso, che premia con x15 la puntata quando 5 di esso atterrano su una linea di pagamento.
Golden Star: questo simbolo è sicuramente l’oggetto da cercare in quanto offre una puntata di 400x quando cinque di essa appaiono in qualsiasi punto dello schermo.

Nota bene: in questa slot online non ci sono giri gratuiti da collezionare e nemmeno jackpot, una scelta di Playson per rendere il gameplay il più fedele possibile alle slot di frutta vintage del passato, d’altra parte però potrai beneficiare di un RTP del 96,46% con una volatilità media che permette di allungare il gioco con vittorie piccole e frequenti.
Gioca a Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines da qualsiasi dispositivo mobile anche con soldi veri, per provare il divertimento di questa slot e sfruttare i bonus di benvenuto e I tanti bonus deposito dei vari provider online. Nel nostro catalogo giochi troverai anche la colorata slot Super Burning Wins sempre di Playson, che fa parte dei giochi nostalgia più divertenti online.

raw_translation.response:
Fruits and Jokers: 100 lines

Just like its predecessor, Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines has a 5 x 4 reel set and a vintage fruit machine-inspired graphic design. This 5-reel, 20-payline free online slot game is part of Playson's "Timeless Fruit Slots" collection. And as the name suggests, there are many fruits and jokers to discover as you spin the reels on a scarlet red background with no soundtrack. Is Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines worth a trip down memory lane? Let's see what our reviewers think.

How to Play? Main Features

You can start playing the Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines slot game online with a minimum bet of €0.20 up to a maximum bet of €100, perfect for players with a low budget or beginners. The slot has 20 fixed paylines, which are only paid out sequentially from left to right. This is a nice upgrade from a traditional fruit slot, where we are used to seeing much fewer paylines, sometimes even less than five. At the bottom of the game panel, you will find an autoplay button that you can adjust up to 999 spins, increasing the speed thanks to the quick spin mode, which speeds up the pace of the reels.

Watch out for the all-fruit symbols and the Wild

The available symbols are quite simple:

Cherries, Lemons, and Oranges pay the minimum,
Grapes, Watermelons, and Lucky 7s are the highest-paying symbols.
The Wild symbol is represented by the Joker, the key character of the game, which can replace any other symbol except the Scatter. It is a generous symbol, rewarding with x15 the bet when five of them land on a payline.
Golden Star: this symbol is definitely the one to look for as it offers a bet of 400x when five of them appear anywhere on the screen.

Note that in this online slot, there are no free spins to collect or jackpots either, a Playson choice to make the gameplay as faithful as possible to vintage fruit slots of the past. On the other hand, however, you can benefit from an RTP of 96.46% with medium volatility, allowing you to stretch the game with small and frequent wins.

Play Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines on any mobile device, even with real money, to experience the fun of this slot and take advantage of the welcome bonuses and many deposit bonuses from various online providers. In our game catalog, you will also find Playson's colorful Super Burning Wins slot, which is one of the most enjoyable online nostalgia games.

Review: Fruits and Jokers: 100 lines

Just like its predecessor, Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines has a 5 x 4 reel set and a graphics that reminds us of vintage fruit machines. This 5 reel, 20 pay line free online slot is part of Playson's "Timeless Fruit Slots" collection. And as the name suggests, there are a lot of fruits and jokers to discover while spinning the reels on a scarlet red background without any soundtrack. Is the slot game Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines worth a trip back in time? Let's see what our reviewers think. 

Gameplay and Main Features

You can start playing the Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines online slot game with a minimum bet of €0.20 up to a maximum bet of €100, a perfect option for players with a low budget or are new to the game. The slot has 20 fixed pay lines, which are only paid in succession from left to right. This is an upgrade from a traditional fruit slot, where we are used to seeing much fewer pay lines, sometimes even less than five. At the bottom of the game box, you will find an autoplay button that can be adjusted up to 999 spins, increasing the speed through the quick spin mode that speeds up the wheel's rhythm. 

Watch out for the All-Fruit Symbols and the Wild

The available symbols are quite simple:
Cherries, Lemons, and Oranges pay the minimum,
Grapes, Watermelons, and Lucky 7s are the highest paying symbols.
The Wild symbol is represented by Joker, the key character of the game, that can replace any other symbol except the Scatter. It is a generous symbol, rewarding with x15 the bet when 5 of it land on a pay line.
Golden Star: This symbol is definitely the item to look for, as it offers a bet of 400x when five of it appear anywhere on the screen.

Note: In this online slot, there are no free spins to collect, and no jackpots, a Playson choice to make the gameplay as faithful as possible to vintage fruit slots of the past. However, you can benefit from an RTP of 96.46% with medium volatility that allows extending the game with small and frequent wins. 

Play Fruits & Jokers: 100 lines from any mobile device, even with real money, to experience the fun of this slot and take advantage of the welcome bonuses and many deposit bonuses from various online providers. In our gaming catalog, you will also find the colorful slot Super Burning Wins, also by Playson, which is one of the most entertaining nostalgia games online.
